sentence.Network_en: A Cherubim does cease to sing.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个天真可爱的儿童便停止唱歌.

sentence.Network_en: He mounted the cherubim and flew; he soared on the wings of the wind.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坐着基路伯飞行, 在风的翅膀上显现.

sentence.Network_en: He mounted cherubim and flew ; he soared on the wings of the wind.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坐著基路伯飞行. 他藉著风的翅膀快飞.
